line_1: At the unequal slighted offer spurn;
line_2: I would not pause, but with a noble Scorn,

line_1: Her rapid feet the ground impatient spurn,
line_2: At length the cruel messengers return,

line_1: The slander and its bearer spurn,
Nor would our homely humour proudly spurn,
line_2: To you the good, the gay, the fair I turn,

line_1: Her med'cines dread, her generous offers spurn.
line_2: Yet from the saving hand of friendship turn,
His breast, where nobler passions burn,

line_1: The guileless heart her happy mansion spurn,
line_2: And part like Ajut — never to return!
